titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4986) to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reduce the default rate on student loans under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-866.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4986 (student loan defaults).
